name: react-native-simple-logger
description: This is a simple logger for React-Native to log things more clearly using colored logs

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git push origin v$PACKAGE_VERSION

author: Ajay Kumar
